C

calcDirection() - Method in class cw3.Customer
Infers the Customer's desired direction by comparing the destinationFloor and currentFloor, and returns it as a String.
changeDirection() - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Changes this elevator's Elevator.direction to its opposite if it's "up" or "down", and prints and error otherwise.
currentFloor - Variable in class cw3.Customer
The floor this customer is on
currentFloor - Variable in class cw3.Elevator
Elevator's current floor
Customer - Class in cw3
This class denotes an elevator customer.
Customer(int, int) - Constructor for class cw3.Customer
Takes as arguments: current floor and destination floor. Sets the Customer.currentFloor and Customer.destinationFloor. Increments the Customer.customerCount. Sets the Customer.id.
customerCount - Static variable in class cw3.Customer
The number of customers that were created by this class thus far
customerJoins(Customer) - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Invoked when it has been determined that a Customer should join the elevator.
customerLeaves(Customer) - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Invoked when it has been determined that a Customer should leave the elevator.
customerList - Variable in class cw3.Building
The list of customers waiting for the elevator in the building
customerList - Variable in class cw3.Elevator
Customers who called the elevator
customers - Static variable in class cw3.AppDriver
Number of customers in the building: sent as an argument to the Building object.
customersWaitingInDirection() - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Returns true if there are Customers waiting in this elevator's Elevator.direction, and false otherwise.
cw3 - package cw3
